Package it.polimi.ingsw.lim.model.immediateEffects

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionEffect
    This class represents an immediate effect that gives the player the ability to make another action: This action could be harvest, production or picking a card from a tower.
    AssetsEffect
    This effect class provides a simple bonus in term of resources
    AssetsMultipliedEffect
    This class represent a specific immediate effect: it gives a bonus multiplied for the amount of assets specified in the "multiplier" value.
    CardMultipliedEffect
    This kind of effect gives to the player a resource bonus, multiplied by the amount of cards of the specified color in the multiplierColor string.
    CouncilFavorsEffect
    This effect gives the player a specified amount of council favors.
    ImmediateEffect
    This abstract class is extended by a subclass for any kind of effect: - ActionEffect - AssetsEffect - AssetsMultipliedEffect - CardMultipliedEffect - CouncilFavorsEffect
